results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/16]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: The World Ski Cup - the last ski meet of the 1972 season. The world’s prettiest insects - the collections of Paris’ Museum of Natural History. Urbanism - a new experiment in development planning in the Paris suburb of Ivry. 2. Dam planning - study of hydraulic developments on small scale models in Grenoble. 3. Hit parade - a song by new pop song star Dani. 4. Swiss art in Paris - a contemporary Swiss art show at the Grand Palais.

results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Press conference at the Elysee Palace - President Pompidou’s press conference. 2. results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/10]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Arts and gifts - the Traditional Arts and Gifts salon. Youth by Bernard Buffet - the yearly Buffet exhibition. results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/04]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Port installations - a new lock for heavy tankers at Le Havre. Electricity and life - an exhibition to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the French Electricity Administration. 2. Gien crockery - 150th anniversary of the Gien Crockery Works. 3. Artificial plant-breeding - hydroponic plant-growth for arid regions. 4. Tapestries - the story of David and Bathsheba. A unique set of tapestries.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/50]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The France Australia Rugby Match - France wins 18 to 9. The Parc des Princes - Paris’ new stadium nearing completion. Helping the builders - mammoth exhibition of building materials. 2. Insects and men - study of insects at the Antibes agronomy laboratory. 3. Abel Gance - one of France’s major movie directors. 4. The arts: Balthus - sketches by Balthus. Naum Gabo - sculptures and dynamic structures.
